name: The Three Of Us
description:
The Three of Us

This is a Twine game about my personal experience in coping with anxiety and depression. You begin as a stressed out chemistry student worried about an upcoming exam. As events progress, you discover that you are your own worst enemy. You must do what you can to keep from destroying yourself.

Installation

The download contains a zip file which can be played on a Javascript supported browser.

Thank You

Brody Brooks - For encouraging me and being the first reader

Rosstin Murphy - Taking the time to read and offer advice

Shael Riley - For doing a final proofreading

Leah Oakes - Cover Image
